meta.job_title: Part-Time Patient Service Associate/Patient Access - Brooklyn

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diversified clerical functions in Registration/Information, Appointments, Patient Care modules, and other areas such as Cashiering and Medical Records.
Maintain the security and confidentiality of patient information at all times.
Greet all patients, family, or related individuals while maintaining excellent customer service at all times.
Provide translation assistance as needed to facilitate the patient and provider interaction.
Report problems with workflow, conflicts, further skill training, and/or other related concerns to supervisory staff.
Provide registration functions in accordance with organization's policies.
Perform financial functions in accordance with organization's policies.
Handle telephone functions in accordance with organization's policies.
